quests.title: The Broken Beacon
quests.description: A beacon failed without storm. Find cause before ships abandon the coast.

quests.title: A Ledger That Doesn’t Balance
quests.description: Three cargos arrived. Four were paid. Someone wants it solved quietly.

quests.title: Midland Border Dispute
quests.description: Boundary stones moved. Two towns ready to brawl. Settle it with words or proof.

quests.title: Silent Patrol
quests.description: A patrol never returned. No blood, no tracks, just an empty route.

quests.title: Dockside Thieves
quests.description: Tools vanish nightly from one pier. Catch the thief. Don’t start a riot.

quests.title: The Sun’s Tithe
quests.description: A consecrated tithe-chest went missing on the road. Recover intact. No questions.

quests.title: A Cartographer’s Error
quests.description: A bridge is ‘missing’ on every new map. Confirm whether it ever existed.

quests.title: The Soot-Glass Shipment
quests.description: Escort a fragile cargo under Farmer seal. Bandits know its value.

quests.title: The Physician’s Request
quests.description: Rare reagents are needed from a guarded storehouse. Bring them quietly and intact.

quests.title: The Unpaid Mason
quests.description: A noble promised pay then vanished. Bring contract proof or bring the debtor.

quests.title: Coin Road Ambush
quests.description: Caravans are hit with inside knowledge. Identify the leak and the leader.

quests.title: Tide Without Reason
quests.description: Currents shifted overnight. Investigate reefs and charts before the fleet sails.

quests.title: The Sun’s Debt
quests.description: A sanctified relic was seized unlawfully. Retrieve it without public scandal.

quests.title: The Slade Courier
quests.description: Escort a sealed message to Chief Harlan. If opened, payment is void.

quests.title: Goldport’s Empty Berths
quests.description: Two berths are avoided by every crew. Find why, before trade bleeds away.

quests.title: The Quiet Warehouse
quests.description: A warehouse was sealed by garrison order. Owner wants the real reason.

quests.title: Stonebridge Tollmen
quests.description: A new ‘toll’ is demanded by armed strangers. Make it stop without burning the bridge.

quests.title: The Tellurian Survey
quests.description: Verify a series of standing stones and record changes. Bring rubbings as proof.

quests.title: The North Watch Disappearance
quests.description: A watchman vanished mid-shift. No alarm. Only a cold cup of tea left behind.

quests.title: Pearlsmore’s Missing Heirloom
quests.description: A family relic vanished during a feast. No forced entry. No accusations. Yet.

quests.title: The Governor’s Silence
quests.description: Three official letters vanished between provinces. Find who stopped them, and why.

quests.title: Ash in the Saltwind
quests.description: Smoke seen offshore with no ships burning. Farmer wants the source found first.

quests.title: Tidebound Judgment
quests.description: A foreign captain stands accused under Pelagos law. Ensure the judgment holds.

quests.title: The Frosted Convoy
quests.description: Escort winter supplies across exposed passes. Raiders have learned the route.

quests.title: A Tellurian Faultline
quests.description: Survey a reported ground-shear. Return sketches and stones. No embellishment.

quests.title: The Molten Tariffs
quests.description: Someone is forging Molten tariffs. Find the press and the buyer.

quests.title: Nightwood’s Missing Bailiff
quests.description: A bailiff vanished with tax ledgers. Return him or the books, but not excuses.

quests.title: The City of Coin Counterfeit
quests.description: Counterfeit coin spreads fast. Identify the mould and the distributor.

quests.title: The Pelagos Drowned Claim
quests.description: Recover an item lost to a wreck. The Temple demands it returned unbroken.

quests.title: Blackwake Arbitration
quests.description: Outlaw captains demand neutral arbiters. Keep it bloodless, if you can.

quests.title: The Sunward Ultimatum
quests.description: A Temple action risks province-wide conflict. You are sent to stop escalation.

quests.title: The Karr Blood Oath
quests.description: An oath-envoy must cross hostile waters. Failure means open feud.

quests.title: Molten’s Burning Contract
quests.description: A treaty draft is being auctioned privately. Acquire it before sunrise.

quests.title: Blackstone’s Iron Peace
quests.description: Prevent a duel between high captains. If it happens, the city fractures politically.

quests.title: Slade’s Hidden Tribunal
quests.description: A traitor will be tried in secret. Your job is to ensure the right witness arrives.

quests.title: Telluria’s Stone-Vault
quests.description: Recover a sealed record from a compromised vault. No copies. No witnesses.

quests.title: Rowthorn’s Sea-Law
quests.description: Enforce Pelagos sea-law against a powerful offender. Bring proof, not bodies.

quests.title: Shatterstrand’s Storm-Taken Cargo
quests.description: A wreck lies half-submerged. Survivors refuse to return. Cargo is still there.

quests.title: The City of Coin Blacklist
quests.description: A blacklist threatens to collapse trade. Find who wrote it, and who paid for it.

quests.title: The Aurushi Schism
quests.description: Two Aurushi cells threaten violence. You are sent to force accord before dawn.

quests.title: The Missing Tar Book
quests.description: Port tariffs are missing. Find who took them before Chief Logan hears rumours.

quests.title: Alderidge Bridge Repairs
quests.description: Escort a wagon of stone and tools. Sabotage is suspected along the road.

quests.title: The Harthvale Night Market
quests.description: A stolen item is being sold tonight. Identify the seller, not just the goods.

quests.title: Sodden’s Missing Fisher
quests.description: A fisher vanished near the marsh edge. Bring back the person or the truth.

quests.title: Lokkem’s Road Wager
quests.description: Escort a merchant’s wagon. He insists the danger is ‘overblown’. Prove him wrong or right.

quests.title: The Bacca Trial-Blade
quests.description: A duel is demanded over insult. Prevent bloodshed without insulting honour further.

quests.title: The Tellurian Loan
quests.description: A borrowed text was never returned. Retrieve it without humiliating the borrower.

quests.title: The Slade Watch Bribe
quests.description: A watchman is taking bribes. Slade wants proof before punishment.

quests.title: The Molten Dock Draft
quests.description: A port draft changed overnight. Ships are grounding. Find who altered the registry.

quests.title: The Bleakhold Prison Transfer
quests.description: Escort a prisoner to Nightwood. The prisoner claims the charge is false.

quests.title: Coldharrow’s Vanished Skiff
quests.description: A skiff returned empty, neatly moored. Crew missing. No sign of struggle.

quests.title: Timberport’s Stolen Keel-Plan
quests.description: A ship plan was stolen from a locked office. Find thief before it’s sold to rivals.

quests.title: The Hand & Saw Debt
quests.description: A debtor is hiding in the city. Bring payment or bring the debtor, politely.

quests.title: The Aurushi Procession
quests.description: Escort a public procession through hostile streets. Any scandal is failure.

quests.title: The Slade Grain Pact
quests.description: Negotiate a grain pact before winter. Rival scribes are sabotaging terms.

quests.title: Pearlsmore’s Silent Bell
quests.description: A temple bell won’t ring. Metal is intact. The silence is the problem.

quests.title: Cassmere’s False Banner
quests.description: Someone marched under Molten colours committing crimes. Find the banner-maker.

quests.title: Icepoint’s Broken Oar Rite
quests.description: A Pelagos rite was interrupted, and now crews refuse to sail. Restore trust with proof.

quests.title: Port Braedin Smuggler’s Ring
quests.description: Smugglers move contraband under ‘sea-law’. Break their chain without breaking the port.

quests.title: The Bolt Isle Hostage Note
quests.description: A hostage note is pinned to the mast of an empty boat. Payment demanded in silence.

quests.title: Mudrock’s Missing Paychest
quests.description: A paychest vanished between two locked rooms. Somebody has a key, or a friend.

quests.title: Prismsmoke’s Unlicensed Flames
quests.description: Someone is performing unsanctioned rites. Identify them before the Temple does publicly.

quests.title: Moorscaste Toll War
quests.description: Two toll crews are fighting over authority. Restore order before trade stalls.

quests.title: Brittle’s Unmarked Graves
quests.description: Bodies were buried without rite. The Temple wants the reason before panic spreads.

quests.title: Fork Farm’s Water Rights
quests.description: Two families threaten violence over irrigation rights. Settle it before sundown.

quests.title: Lowland Farm’s Missing Hands
quests.description: Three farmhands vanished after payday. No tracks from the house, only from the road.

quests.title: Woodbury’s Counterfeit Seal
quests.description: A counterfeit Blackstone seal is used to requisition goods. Find the forger.

quests.title: Shadowhall’s Locked Room
quests.description: A room has been locked from inside for days. No sound. No smell. Just silence.

quests.title: The Slade Stone-Cache
quests.description: Recover a cache of ritual stone taken by ‘collectors’. Return it without incident.

quests.title: The Pirate Tax
quests.description: A ‘tax’ is being demanded from locals by a new gang. Stop it without inviting worse.

quests.title: The Blackstone Peace Meeting
quests.description: Hostile delegates must meet under your protection. If talks fail, blame lands on you.

quests.title: The Farmer Road Purge
quests.description: Bandit toll posts are spreading. Remove them and bring the leader alive if possible.

quests.title: Bacca’s Mountain Accord
quests.description: Secure an accord between rival captains. Any insult risks civil fracture.

quests.title: The Slade Blackmail Ledger
quests.description: A ledger of secrets is being sold. Acquire it without leaving a trail to Slade.

quests.title: The Pelagos Deep-Charter
quests.description: Chart a dangerous channel and return proof. Failure strands fleets for a season.

quests.title: Icepoint’s Raider Flagship
quests.description: A raider flagship is rallying lesser crews. Break it. Bring back the banner.

quests.title: Goldport’s Firebrand Smugglers
quests.description: Smugglers move illicit rite-goods. Capture leader alive for confession.

quests.title: The City of Coin Auction Night
quests.description: A forbidden item will be auctioned. Identify the buyer and the sponsor.

quests.title: Redstone’s Glassblowers’ Strike
quests.description: Workers refuse the kilns after an accident. Solve cause or strike becomes riot.

quests.title: Blackwatch’s Border Papers
quests.description: Border papers were stolen before inspection. Recover them before dawn roll-call.

quests.title: The Bolt Isle False Rescue
quests.description: A ‘rescue’ crew lures ships onto rocks. Identify them without being lured yourself.

quests.title: The Karr Winter Oath
quests.description: A broken oath threatens blood feud. Bring the offender to speak or to pay.

quests.title: Rowthorn’s Salt-Charms
quests.description: A crate of salt-charms was stolen. Return it before crews refuse to sail.

quests.title: The Tellurian Stonewright
quests.description: Escort a stonewright to inspect a cracked shrine. Locals are hostile to outsiders.

quests.title: Bacca’s Lost Standard
quests.description: A clan standard vanished after a skirmish. Return it before rivals spread the story.

quests.title: Farmer’s Sun-Oil Cache
quests.description: A sun-oil cache was raided. Track thieves before the Temple blames civilians.

quests.title: Molten’s Missing Surveyor
quests.description: A surveyor vanished with bridge plans. Without them, trade halts in days.

quests.title: Nightwood’s Counter-Summons
quests.description: Someone is forging temple summons to lure citizens. Find the hand behind the ink.

quests.title: The East Isle Lost Buoy
quests.description: A guiding buoy is missing. Find it before a ship breaks on the reef.

quests.title: The Bolt Isle Powder Keg
quests.description: A stash of volatile contraband is set to sell tonight. Prevent the sale or steal it first.

quests.title: Blackstone’s Coastal Reckoning
quests.description: A coastal captain threatens to defect. Bring him back to the table without threats.

quests.title: Telluria’s Quiet Census
quests.description: A census is being altered. Find who is ‘removing’ names and where they went.

quests.title: Aurush’s Fireproof Vault
quests.description: Recover a sealed item from a compromised vault. No witnesses. No delays.

quests.title: Slade’s Border Host
quests.description: A hostile warband camps near the border. Disperse it without sparking open war.

quests.title: Molten’s Sunsteel Shipment
quests.description: Escort sunsteel ingots under seal. Thieves won’t strike twice. They’ll strike once, hard.

quests.title: Karr’s Sea Funeral
quests.description: A sea funeral was interrupted. Retrieve the lost token before crews refuse the water.

quests.title: Rowthorn’s Reef Trial
quests.description: A captain refuses Pelagos ruling after a reefing. Bring him to accept judgment peacefully.

quests.title: Bolt Isle: The Noose Market
quests.description: A notorious fence is selling names, not goods. Stop the sale or buy it first.
secondary_rewards: Bolt Isle contact: permanent if spared

quests.title: Telluria’s Final Seal
quests.description: Protect a high-ritual from interference. Your role is defense and restraint.

quests.title: Blackstone’s Crown Witness
quests.description: Escort a key witness to a closed hearing. If they vanish, the city’s power shifts overnight.

quests.title: Oslan Wyst
quests.description: Wanted for blackmail and bribery. Last seen at the abandoned kiln-houses. Alive preferred. Bring proof (a signet ring) to claim the reward.

quests.title: Otho Mire
quests.description: Wanted for poisoning wells. Last seen beneath the fallen beacon. Alive preferred. Bring proof (the creature’s jawbone) to claim the reward.

quests.title: Frostwarg Alpha
quests.description: Wanted for armed extortion. Last seen at the abandoned kiln-houses. Dead or Alive. Bring proof (a severed horn) to claim the reward.

quests.title: Maerys Sorn
quests.description: Wanted for raiding coastal skiffs. Last seen along the coastal cliffs. Alive only. Bring proof (the leader’s ledger) to claim the reward.

quests.title: Rootbound Husk
quests.description: Wanted for counterfeit seals. Last seen along the coastal cliffs. Alive only. Bring proof (a unique tattoo sketch) to claim the reward.

quests.title: Caldus Dorne
quests.description: Wanted for grave-robbery. Last seen in the night market alleys. Dead or Alive. Bring proof (a unique tattoo sketch) to claim the reward.

quests.title: Ironhorn Buckbear
quests.description: Wanted for kidnapping for coin. Last seen at the abandoned kiln-houses. Alive preferred. Bring proof (the creature’s jawbone) to claim the reward.

quests.title: Nightglass Stalker
quests.description: Wanted for poisoning wells. Last seen in the night market alleys. Alive preferred. Bring proof (the creature’s jawbone) to claim the reward.

quests.title: Frostwarg Alpha
quests.description: Wanted for armed extortion. Last seen by the northern watchpost. Alive preferred. Bring proof (a marked dagger) to claim the reward.

quests.title: Runa Renn
quests.description: Wanted for murder on the road. Last seen within the reed-choked shallows. Alive only. Bring proof (a severed horn) to claim the reward.
